name: Worm Run!
description:
***** Play now the crazy addictive worm game! *****

Slither the worm carefully through each obstacle. Don’t forget to retract before obstacle hits you. The longer you expand, the faster you retract.

HOW TO PLAY WORM RUN!?
- Hold to expand, release to retract.
- Avoid getting hit.

You die by getting hit by the obstacle, be careful!

Play now Worm Run! and compete with others on global leaderboards.
